description:
Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama`s army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!
Fukushuu no Arashi: Ikari no Gundan Shuurai!
Sturm der Rache! – Angriff der wütenden Armee!
Une tempête vengeresse ! Une armée enragée attaque !
عاصفة انتقام! مجيء جيش غاضب للهجوم!
復讐の嵐 怒りの軍団襲来!
